MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:20am to repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:47am on the 22nd of January 2021.
